mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and navy on brown) announcing Dave Plunkert of Spur Design at the Watkins College of Art and Design Main Theater on February 7. Poster features a woodblock design of a man.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
